recordTypes.name: Certified Birth or Death certificate
recordTypes.description: Order and pay for certified copies of birth or death certificates.

recordTypes.name: Business License/Entertainment License
recordTypes.description: This form should be filled out for businesses that are new to the Town of Brattleboro.  If you are renewing your license, please log in to your existing account by clicking on the "Login" link on the upper right.   Any questions about this form can be directed to assessors@brattleboro.gov or calling 802-251-8156

recordTypes.name: Business Personal Property Fine
recordTypes.description: If you received a Notice of Fine for Failure to File Business Personal Property, please use this form to pay your fine online.

recordTypes.name: Non-Certified Birth or Death certificate Copy
recordTypes.description: Order and pay for non-certified copies of birth or death certificates.

recordTypes.name: Marriage or Civil Union Certified copies
recordTypes.description: Order and pay for certified of marriage or civil union licenses.

recordTypes.name: Marriage or Civil Union non-certified copies
recordTypes.description: Order and pay for non-certified copies marriage or civil union licenses.   These copies are informational only and cannot be used for legal purposes.

recordTypes.name: Dog License
recordTypes.description: Click here to license a new dog.  To renew a dog license, login to your OpenGov account: records up for renewal will appear in the actions needed section.  Call our office at 802-251-8157 for assistance using this portal.

categories.name: Office of Assessment
categories.content:
Brattleboro requires all businesses doing business in Town to apply for a license. (See Chapter 11 of the Code of Ordinances.) Businesses have 30 days from the date of opening to obtain a license. Licenses expire annually on March 15 and cost $100.

You may also apply for or renew your Entertainment license through this process. Entertainment licenses also renew annually on March 15. New or
